actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to authorize the President to suspend credit for export to certain countries.

summary.text: Authorizes the President, under the Export-Import Bank Act, to suspend the extension of credits by the Export-Import Bank to countries which are restricting exports to the United States or which are maintaining increased prices for such exports.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to authorize the President to suspend credit for export to certain countries.
